mapper.select: SELECT a.id_municipality FROM municipality a where a.municipality = #{municipality} and a.status=1
SELECT id_municipality idLocation, municipality locationName, lon longitude, lat latitude FROM municipality WHERE municipality.status=1

SELECT a.municipality as nameLocationCovid, b.date as dateLocationCovid, SUM(b.death_cases) as deathCases, SUM(b.confirmed_cases) as confirmedCases, SUM(b.vaccinated) as vaccinated, SUM(b.cumulative_cases) as cumulativeCases, SUM(b.recuperated) as recuperated
FROM municipality a, covid_data b, municipality_covid_data d
WHERE a.id_municipality = #{municipalityId} and b.date = #{dateCovid} and a.id_municipality = d.id_municipality and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1

SELECT a.municipality as nameLocationCovid, b.date as dateLocationCovid, SUM(b.death_cases) as deathCases, SUM(b.confirmed_cases) as confirmedCases, SUM(b.vaccinated) as vaccinated, SUM(b.cumulative_cases) as cumulativeCases, SUM(b.recuperated) as recuperated
FROM municipality a, covid_data b, municipality_covid_data d
WHERE b.date = #{dateCovid} and a.id_municipality = d.id_municipality and b.id_covid_data = d.id_covid_data and b.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id_municipality
